name: MSD research group
title: Modeling and Data Science
abstract: The MSD research group is part of the IRIMAS Institute from Universit√© de Haute-Alsace, in Mulhouse. The research carried out by the MSD team concerns modeling and data science and focuses on theories and algorithms for extracting knowledge from large masses of data, generated by computer systems. Our work is in the fields of artificial intelligence, machine learning, data mining, big data and deep learning. In particular, our group has specific skills in the analysis of time series.
